UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational Design of Plant Hairpin-like Peptide EcAMP1: Structural-Functional Correlations to Reveal Antibacterial and Antifungal Activity.
Literature.Author: Barashkova AS, Ryazantsev DY, Rogozhin EA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(no activity data),Escherichia coli(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(no activity data),Candida albicans(no activity data),Fusarium oxysporum TSKHA-4(IC50=23.2±2.6µM),Fusarium graminearum VKM F-1668(IC50=18.1±2.1µM),Fusarium solani(IC50=11±1.9µM),Aspergillus niger VKM F-33(IC50=>32µM),Bipolaris sorokiniana VKM F-1446(IC50=>32µM),Alternaria alternata(IC50=>32µM)
